subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: David Lighty’s 21 points included all 13 points of a crucial 13-2 run in the second half after the Illini cut the Buckeyes’ lead to 6.
snippet: David Lighty’s 21 points included all 13 points of a crucial 13-2 run in the second half after the Illini cut the Buckeyes’ lead to 6.
